content: on needle2 repeat rnd1 and work chart a until you have completed chart a in total 8 times in height now the sock measures from top down around 9cm/3 5inches heel flap set up： the heel flap and heel turn are worked flat the first needle will be worked for heel the stitches on second needle will be the instep of the sock these stitches will not be worked again until after the heel flap and heel turn are finished heel flap： for the heel flap and heel turn you will only work with 30/32 sts on first needle row1 rs s1 knit wise *k1 p1* repeat ** until last st k1 turn work row2 ws s1 purl wise *k1 p1* repeat ** until last st p1 turn work row3 rs s1 knit wise k the rest row4 ws s1 purl wise k until the last st p1 repeat row1 and row4 another 6 times to get 14 selvage sts on each side next row rs s1 knit wise *k1 p1* repeat ** until last st k1 turn work last row ws s1 purl wise *k1 p1* repeat ** until last st p1 turn work now in total you should 15 selvages sts on each side start heel turn with a knit row on the rs side heel turn for heel turn you will work short row it means you will only work some of the stitches on a row and turn your work work another few stitches and turn your work again this shapes the curve of the heel turn row1 rs slip 1 knit wise k 16/18 ssk k1 turn row2 ws s1 purl wise p5/7 p2tog p1 turn row3 rs s1 knit wise k to one stitch before the gap ssk k1 turn 4 row4 ws s1 purl wise p to one stitch before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat row 3 and row 4 until you have worked all stitches you will end with a purl row heel gusset start from rs again at this point you will continue to work in rounds use a stitch marker to mark the beginning slip first st knit wise k across your needle use the same needle to pick up 15 stiches from the heel flap pick up extra stitch at the corner to eliminate having a small gap in the corner next k across the instep sts following chart a all instep sts should be on one needle continue to pick up extra stitch at the corner to eliminate having a small gap in the corner then pick up another 15 stiches from the side of heel flap and place a stitch marker to mark the beginning of new round continue knitting to make sure all picked up sts from both sides of heel flaps and heel sts are on the same needle the other needle should only hold the instep stiches work one round in stockinette sts on needle1 and follow chart a on needle2 gusset decrease
